name: Aminu Sulaiman
bio: Aminu Sulaiman is a forward-thinking Public Health Consultant and strategic planner known for blending modern data insights with community realities. A graduate with a vision to reform Nigeria’s preventive healthcare structure, Aminu has been instrumental in developing outreach models and youth mentorship systems under the Consultancy Firm’s research wing. His approach combines health education, digital communication, and behavioral insights — shaping a new era of local health advocacy that connects professionals with purpose.

cards.title: Key Competencies
cards.content: Public Health Planning, Data-driven Communication, Program Evaluation, and Strategic Consultancy.

cards.title: Major Projects
cards.content: Developed the 'Community Pulse' framework — a local data insight system for mapping rural health behavior. Led digital outreach strategies for youth health initiatives in Northern Nigeria.

cards.title: Leadership & Research
cards.content: Conducted studies on the impact of culturally adaptive communication in health promotion. Co-authored consultancy reports for Talk2Health network and emerging partners.

cards.title: Philosophy
cards.content: Aminu believes that lasting health change begins with systems thinking — understanding people, places, and perception. His work bridges field realities with evidence-based strategies.

cards.title: Vision Ahead
cards.content: To strengthen the Consultancy Firm’s capacity for AI-assisted community diagnosis and enhance inter-state collaboration for health educators across Nigeria.
